detail_desc: Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Padded front and back sections, zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and inset side panels in sturdy jersey lined with thermal fleece. Longer and rounded at the back. Partly lined.

3/4-length sports trousers in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with a mesh section at the back and ribbed hems. The trousers are made partly from recycled polyester.
3/4-length, lightweight sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
3/4-length, lightweight sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Padded front and back sections, zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and inset side panels in sturdy jersey lined with thermal fleece. Longer and rounded at the back. Partly lined.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and reflective details.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front. Padded front and back sections and fleece-lined raglan sleeves in sturdy jersey with ribbed panels. Inset jersey panels in the sides and zipped front pockets. Longer and gently rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel.

Lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying functional rustle fabric designed for running with a stand-up collar with an elastic drawstring at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip, airholes under the arms and elasticated cuffs. Seam with an elastic drawstring at the back of the waist, reflective details and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short, lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Short gilet with a quilted, lightly padded front, small ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Front pockets with a concealed zip and a jersey back with a brushed, thermal inside. Wide ribbing around the armholes and hem. Lined front.
Sports set with a sports top and pair of sports shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Straight-cut, boxy-style jacket in windproof, functional fabric made from recycled polyester. Hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip down the front and discreet front pockets. Long raglan sleeves with wide jersey ribbing and thumbholes at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Mesh sections at the back of the knees, and a print motif and reflective details on one leg.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted side seams and short raglan sleeves.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Padded front and back sections, zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and inset side panels in sturdy jersey lined with thermal fleece. Longer and rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with cuffs and a zip at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated edge, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Discreet mobile phone pocket with a press-stud at one side, size approx. 9.5x17 cm.

Outdoor trousers in slightly stretchy fabric with sections in water-repellent functional fabric. Elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a zipped leg pocket and a drawstring at the hems. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour waist panel.
Sports trousers in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem.
Stretchy outdoor trousers in water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with side pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Reinforced hems and a zip fly with a press-stud and hook and loop fastener.

Sports trousers in a rustle weave made from recycled polyester. High waist with wide, covered elastication and an elastic drawstring. Side pockets and tapered legs with an elastic drawstring at the hems.

Trousers geared to outdoor activity with good air permeability to wick away moisture. The trousers are made from a stretchy woven fabric for increased mobility, with a water-repellent finish on the bum and knees. Elasticated waist for added comfort, a zip fly and button, side pockets and a diagonal, zipped leg pocket for safe storage of valuables. Reinforced, wear-resistant hems with adjustable fasteners. Unlined.
Double-layered sports top in fast-drying functional fabric and mesh with a print motif on the front, racer back and cap sleeves.

Outdoor trousers in slightly stretchy fabric with sections in water-repellent functional fabric. Elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a zipped leg pocket and a drawstring at the hems. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.

Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, small stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Fleece lining.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, hood, front pockets and a contrasting colour zip down the front with a chin guard.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour waist panel.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.
Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.

Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, small stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Fleece lining.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide top in closely-woven mesh with a round neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with a print on one leg and a contrasting colour waist panel.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.

Outdoor jacket in fast-drying, functional rustle fabric with a drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud and a ribbed, elasticated hem. Unlined.

Shell jacket in windproof, breathable functional fabric with taped seams, waterproof zips and a hood with a reinforced peak and elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and zips at both sides that open for ventilation. Snow flaps with reinforced elastication and adjustable press-stud fastenings at the waist, and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sports set with a short-sleeved top and shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Running jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Loose yoke at the back with a concealed, ventilating mesh section, long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, side pockets and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with crossover straps at the back and an elasticated hem.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
3/4-length, lightweight sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and twisted side seams.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Sports trousers in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring at the top and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.

Fitted outdoor shorts in stretch, fast-drying functional fabric with a zip fly, press-stud at the waist, and hook and loop safety fastener at the waistband. Zipped front pockets, a zipped leg pocket and a stretch panel at the crotch for optimum mobility and comfort.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted seams and contrasting colour mesh sections at the sides. Round neck with narrow ribbing and short raglan sleeves.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.

Hooded sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a soft brushed inside and contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves. Small stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and a narrow trim around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the top.
Sports set with a short-sleeved top and shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist and inset elastication on the outside of the hems.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide top in closely-woven mesh with a round neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with a print on one leg and a contrasting colour waist panel.

Lightweight popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with a small peak at the front and a concealed elastic drawstring at the back, a zip at the top and a zipped front pocket. Long sleeves with ventilating holes under the arms and narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined. The popover jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband. Layered over a pair of short running tights. The shorts are made partly from recycled polyester.

Unlined. The polyamide content of the jacket is recycled.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a lined, padded hood and practical two-way zip down the front that can open from both directions for easy access. Extra-long sleeves with an inset section in stretch fabric underneath for greater movement and cuffs with thumbholes to help you stay warm outside. Front pockets with a concealed zip for safe storage of valuables. Rounded hem that is slightly longer at the back for a better fit when moving. Lined.

Quilted jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric designed to keep you dry during light showers and protect you from the wind. The jacket has a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets with a concealed zip to keep your valuables safe. Outer fabric and padding made from recycled polyester. The jacket has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.
Block-coloured jacket in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar and a contrasting colour zip down the front. Concealed pockets in the side seams and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
